importancia.title: Why is Your Google Business Profile EVERYTHING?
importancia.content: Because it's your digital business card. It's the first impression. An unanswered negative review screams "I don't care". An unthanked positive review is a missed opportunity. ACTIVE management tells Google and customers: "I'm here, I'm active, and I care". This is how you 'get on Google Maps' and 'improve local SEO in Tenerife'.

protocolo.title: The Protocol: 'How to Respond to Negative Reviews'
protocolo.content: A bad review isn't the end of the world; it's a golden opportunity to show your professionalism. We never respond heatedly; we apply a clear protocol:

steps.title: Immediate Notification
steps.description: We detect the review and notify you. We analyze the case: is it a real customer or a troll?

steps.title: Professional Draft
steps.description: We prepare a draft response focused on calming the customer and offering solutions.

steps.title: Your Approval
steps.description: We never publish anything without your approval. We define the response with you.

steps.title: Publication and Closure
steps.description: We publish the response, turning a public complaint into a demonstration of customer service.
